Jumlah Penyusun Naskah Pidato Anies Bertambah Pada 2020
06 Nov 2019, 01:48 by Imam Hamdi, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Biro Kepala Daerah dan Kerjasama Luar Negeri DKI Jakarta mengajukan penambahan jumlah penyusun naskah pidato Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menjadi empat orang. Sebelumnya, penyusun naskah pidato gubernur berjumlah dua orang.
Kepala Biro Kepala Daerah dan Kerjasama Luar Negeri DKI Jakarta, Mawardi, mengatakan penambahan jumlah penyusun naskah pidato lantaran melihat frekuensi pidato gubernur cukup banyak. "Tidak hanya Gubernur, para asisten yang mewakili gubernur kami siapkan juga (naskah pidatonya)," kata dia saat dihubungi, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Indonesia Budget Center (IBC) menemukan kejanggalan anggaran untuk penyusun naskah pidato pada rancangan plafon anggaran 2020. Sebab, Biro Kepala Daerah DKI mengajukan anggaran Rp 392 juta, yang jika dikonversi untuk 6,5 orang selama 12 bulan.
Menurut Mawardi, adanya kesalahan jumlah tenaga penyusun naskah pidato menjadi 6,5 orang karena belum menggunakan komponen perhitungan yang baru. Sistem e-budgeting belum meng-upgrade data komponen gaji dalam sistemnya. Padahal, gaji untuk penyusun naskah pidato gubernur telah diusul naik tahun depan dari Rp 5 juta menjadi Rp 8,2 juta.
Kenaikan gaji untuk penyusun naskah pidato gubernur tertuang dalam Keputusan Gubernur DKI Nomor 1214 Tahun 2019 tentang satuan biaya untuk honorarium tenaga ahli nonpegawai aparatur sipil negara tim penyusun sambutan, pidato, makalah dan kertas kerja Gubernur dan Wakil Gubernur. "Kesalahan jumlah penyusun naskah karena di sistem masih hitungan yang lama," kata Mawardi.
Mawardi menuturkan jumlah penyusun naskah pidato telah ada sejak gubernur sebelumnya. Hanya saja jumlahnya tidak mencapai empat seperti yang diusulkan tahun depan. "Jumlahnya saya lupa. Tapi yang terakhir tahun ini dua," ujarnya.
Peneliti IBC Rahmat mengungkap adanya duplikasi anggaran untuk penyusun naskah pidato gubernur. "Kami katakan duplikasi anggaran karena anggaran yang sudah dianggarkan di instansi tertentu tetapi dianggarkan juga di instansi lainnya," ujar Peneliti IBC Rahmat di Kantor ICW Senin, 4 November 2019.
Rahmat menyatakan mereka menemukan anggaran tersebut diusulkan oleh Biro Kepala Daerah dan Kerjasama Luar Negeri senilai Rp 390 juta. Selain itu, ditemukan pada Suku Dinas Komunikasi, Informasi dan Statistik Kepulauan Seribu Rp 240 juta.
Selain anggaran yang terduplikasi, Rahmat menemukan kejanggalan lain, yaitu anggaran penyusun naskah pidato pada Biro Kepala Daerah dan Kerjasama Luar Negeri diperuntukkan untuk 6,5 orang selama 12 bulan. Sedangkan anggaran pada Suku Dinas Komunikasi, Informasi dan Statistik Kepulauan Seribu diperuntukkan untuk 4 orang selama 12 bulan. "Itu hitungan 6,5 orang dari mana?," kata dia.

The Number of Drafting of Anies Speech Manus Increases in 2020
Nov 6 2019, 01:48 by Imam Hamdi, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Bureau of Regional Head and Foreign Cooperation of DKI Jakarta has proposed to increase the number of drafting speeches of DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan to four people. Previously, there were two people composed the governor's speech.
The Head of the DKI Jakarta Regional and Foreign Cooperation Bureau, Mawardi, said that the increase in the number of drafting speeches was due to the fact that the governor's speech frequency was quite large. "Not only the Governor, the assistants who represent the governor we also prepare (the text of his speech)," he said when contacted on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The Indonesia Budget Center (IBC) found budget irregularities for drafting speech texts on the 2020 budget ceiling design. Because, the DKI Regional Head Bureau submitted a budget of Rp. 392 million, which if converted to 6.5 people for 12 months.
According to Mawardi, there was an error in the number of composing speech texts to 6.5 because they had not used the new calculation components. The e-budgeting system has not upgraded the salary component data in the system. In fact, salaries for drafters of the governor's speech have been proposed to rise next year from Rp 5 million to Rp 8.2 million.
Salary increase for the drafting of the governor's speech draft contained in the Decree of the Governor of DKI Number 1214 of 2019 concerning the unit cost for the honorarium of the non civil servant civil service expert team of the drafting remarks, speeches, papers and working papers of the Governor and Deputy Governor. "The number of drafting texts is wrong because the system is still a long count," Mawardi said.
Mawardi said the number of drafting speeches had been there since the previous governor. It's just that the number does not reach four as proposed next year. "I forgot the number. But the last one this year was two," he said.
IBC Rahmat researcher revealed the existence of budget duplication for the drafting of the governor's speech. "We say the duplication of the budget because the budget has been budgeted in certain institutions but also budgeted in other agencies," said IBC Researcher Rahmat at the ICW Office Monday, November 4, 2019.
Rahmat said they found the budget was proposed by the Regional Head of Bureau and Foreign Cooperation valued at Rp 390 million. In addition, it was found in the Thousand Islands Communication, Information and Statistics Office of Rp. 240 million.
In addition to the duplicated budget, Rahmat found another irregularity, namely the budget for drafting the speech text at the Regional Head of Bureau and Overseas Cooperation was intended for 6.5 people for 12 months. While the budget in the Thousand Islands Communication, Information and Statistics Office is for 4 people for 12 months. "That's a matter of 6.5 people from where ?," he said.
